Html:
I will be releasing beta 2 of “Ascend.NET” Windows Forms Controls on Sunday 7/16.

I’m thinking of adding an additional beta to the release schedule. I’m still working on automatically adding the controls and help to Visual Studio. I could add these to the release candidate but I would also like to add the “glass” look to the controls on this version rather than 1.5. The controls we are adding in version 1.5 will take 2 -3 months to get done and I hate to not have this feature for that long.

Any opinions on adding an additional beta and delaying the production release for a short bit?

Thanks,
scorn
I delayed beta 2 for 3 more days to work out some bugs and add a few more features. Sorry for the delay.
